data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Strawberry Hill 30m, Oregon, USA (SH30XX)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Strawberry Hill 30m, Oregon, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway XTI Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2006-05-28. The instrument depth was 014 meters, in an overall water depth of 30 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
